channel.title: [508] Admin, Owner, Mod, How TO?
channel.description:
I need help on owner-ing/admin/mod-ing on Berky-Scape 508.
Please help, rep + if.

item.title: [508] Admin, Owner, Mod, How TO?
item.dc:creator: @anc13ntpk3r anc13ntpk3r
item.description:
@anc13ntpk3r wrote:

umm if you want to compile use this

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./bin/ ./palidino76/players/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/update/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/items/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/combat/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java pause

put that in your compile or all.bat and change the jdk1.6.0_11

to your version

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Admin, Owner, Mod, How TO?
item.dc:creator: @anc13ntpk3r anc13ntpk3r
item.description:
@anc13ntpk3r wrote:

find login.java which will be here

src/palidino76/rs2/io

then click login.java and search this

rights

then change the name to yours and the p.rights to 2. not 3. you can only do 1-2
